At ____ back ____ her ____, ____ brutal ____, ____ is ____ an ____ of ____ unanswerable. At ____ rate, this ____ radically ____ her ____ and ____. data.partBlankContent: In all her writing, one senses an observant eye for the mystery of life and for that which cannot be explained by reason or the human intellect. At t__ back o_ her so___, alm___ brutal rea____, th___ is alw___ an ink____ of some_____ unanswerable. At a__ rate, this cri___ radically cha____ her vi___ and ideo____. Whereas she had once believed that man created God, she eventually came to believe that God created man.
data.fullContent: In all her writing, one senses an observant eye for the mystery of life and for that which cannot be explained by reason or the human intellect. At the back of her sober, almost brutal realism, there is always an inkling of something unanswerable. At any rate, this crisis radically changed her views and ideology. Whereas she had once believed that man created God, she eventually came to believe that God created man.
data.answer: 在她所有的作品中，人们都能感受到一双敏锐的眼睛，它能洞察生命的奥秘，洞察那些无法用理性或人类智慧来解释的事物。在她冷静、近乎残酷的现实主义背后，总有一种无法回答的暗示。无论如何，这场危机从根本上改变了她的观点和意识形态。虽然她曾经相信人创造了上帝，但她最终相信上帝创造了人。
